column2: p1 <- ggplot(hotels_small, aes(x = is_repeated_guest, y = previous_cancellations)) +
labs(title = "Repeated guest vs number of previous cancellations")
p2 <- ggplot(hotels_small, aes(x = season, y = adr)) +
labs(title = "Season vs Average Daily Rate", y = "Average Daily Rate") +
p3 <- ggplot(hotels_small, aes(x = hotel, y = adr)) +
labs(title = "Hotel Type vs Average Daily Rate", y = "Average Daily Rate") +
p4 <- ggplot(hotels_small, aes(x = season, y = lead_time)) +
labs(title = "Season vs Lead Time", y = "Lead Time (days)")
